entry.title: Ready. Set. Octopress.
entry.content:
Test

1. This is a list.
    a. Hello
    b. Bye

block quote stuff

javascript var hello = "hello"; var length = hello.length; // This is a block of javascript code

in line code here

I wish block quotes, code blocks, etc. didn’t look so dark and blue. How can I change these colors/styles? Changing from rdiscount to redcarpet markdown engine has helped with block quotes. The list and code block styles still clash with my blog’s style. I tried to use the redcarpet2_markdown.rb plugin, but it causes rake generate to throw a fit.
